items.title: Denmark warns of 'fundamental disagreement' after White House talks on Greenland
items.title_zh: 丹麦警告在白宫讨论格陵兰后,
items.summary: Denmark's foreign minister has said there is a "fundamental disagreement" with the US over Greenland after talks at the White House.
items.summary_zh: 丹麦外交部长表示,在白宫会谈后,在格陵兰问题上与美国存在"基本分歧".

items.title: US and UK pulling some personnel from Qatar military base
items.title_zh: 美国和英国从卡塔尔军事基地撤出一些人员
items.summary: The US and UK are reducing the number of personnel at the Al-Udeid air base in Qatar, as US President Donald Trump considers whether to take action against Iran over its crackdown on anti-government protests.
items.summary_zh: 美国和英国正在减少卡塔尔Al-Udeid空军基地的人员,正如美国总统唐纳德·特朗普考虑是否对伊朗镇压反政府抗议采取行动.

items.title: US launches phase two of Gaza peace plan with new technocratic government
items.title_zh: 美国与新的技术官僚政府共同发起加沙和平计划的第二阶段
items.summary: US envoy Steve Witkoff has announced the start of phase two of President Donald Trump's plan to end the war in Gaza, with a technocratic Palestinian government established in the territory.
items.summary_zh: 美国特使史蒂夫·维特克夫已宣布开始唐纳德·特朗普总统结束加沙战争计划的第二阶段,在该领土成立了技术官僚的巴勒斯坦政府.

items.title: Why two Canadian provinces are in a spat over Crown Royal whisky
items.title_zh: 为什么加拿大两省 都在喝皇家威士忌
items.summary: A British owned, Canadian-made whisky is at the centre of a spat between two provinces that is testing a unified "Team Canada" approach in the face of US tariffs.
items.summary_zh: 英国拥有、加拿大制造的威士忌是两省之间的热点,

items.title: 'Appropriate and unambiguous': White House defends Trump over middle-finger gesture at heckler
items.title_zh: "恰当而毫不含糊": 白宫保卫特朗普 在赫克勒的中指手势
items.summary: The White House has defended US President Donald Trump after he aimed an offensive gesture at a heckler during his appearance at the Ford factory in Detroit on Tuesday.
items.summary_zh: 白宫为美国总统唐纳德·特朗普辩护,此前他星期二在底特律福特工厂出场时,对一名赫克勒人进行了攻击姿态.

items.title: Trump administration pauses immigrant visa processing for 75 countries
items.title_zh: 特朗普政府暂停75个国家的移民签证处理.
items.summary: The Trump administration is placing an indefinite pause on immigrant visa processing from 75 countries, further restricting the legal routes for entering the US.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普政府无限期地暂停来自75个国家的移民签证手续,进一步限制了进入美国的合法路线.

items.title: Uganda election chief says he has had threats over results declaration
items.title_zh: 乌干达选举主任表示,
items.summary: The head of Uganda's electoral body says he has received threats warning him against declaring certain presidential candidates the winners of Thursday's election.
items.summary_zh: 乌干达选举机构负责人表示,他受到威胁,警告他不要宣布某些总统候选人是星期四选举的获胜者。

items.title: Starlink reportedly made free in Iran - but protesters are taking huge risks by using it
items.title_zh: Starlink在伊朗自由了,
items.summary: Starlink has reportedly waived monthly subscription payments for users inside Iran after its government shut down the internet last Thursday - cutting off millions of people from their families, livelihoods and access to information, during a deadly crackdown on protests.
items.summary_zh: Starlink在伊朗政府上个星期四关闭互联网后, 便免除了伊朗国内用户的每月订阅费,

items.title: FBI searches home of Washington Post reporter in classified documents probe
items.title_zh: FBI在华盛顿邮报记者家 搜索机密文件
items.summary: Agents with the US Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) raided the home of a Washington Post reporter this week as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of leaking classified information, officials said.
items.summary_zh: 美国联邦调查局的特工本周突袭了一位华盛顿邮报记者的家,

items.title: Italian influencer Chiara Ferragni cleared of cake fraud
items.title_zh: 意大利影响者Chiara Ferragni 清除了蛋糕欺诈
items.summary: An Italian fashion influencer has been acquitted of aggravated fraud, bringing a long-running scandal involving a charity Christmas cake to an end.
items.summary_zh: 一名意大利时尚影响者因严重欺诈被宣告无罪,结束了一场长期涉及慈善会圣诞蛋糕的丑闻.

items.title: Tehran morgue videos show the brutality of Iran's crackdown on protesters
items.title_zh: 德黑兰停尸房录像显示伊朗镇压抗议者的残暴行为。
items.summary: Warning: this story contains content which some readers might find distressing
items.summary_zh: 警告:这个故事包含一些读者可能感到痛苦的内容

items.title: Swiss regions ban pyrotechnics after ski bar fire
items.title_zh: 瑞士地区禁止滑雪棒起火后的烟花
items.summary: The Swiss canton of Valais has banned pyrotechnic devices in all indoor public venues following the devastating fire at a bar on New Year's Eve where 40 people were killed and 116 were injured.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士瓦莱州在除夕夜酒吧发生毁灭性火灾后,禁止在所有室内公共场所安装烟花装置,该酒吧有40人死亡,116人受伤.

items.title: LA opens ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
items.title_zh: 洛杉矶2028年奥运会开票抽签 - 座位起价为28美元
items.summary: Sport fans can now sign up for a chance to attend the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic Games - with tickets starting at $28 (£21).
items.summary_zh: 体育爱好者现在可以报名参加2028年洛杉矶奥运会-票价为28美元(21英镑).

items.title: At least 32 killed after crane collapses on train in Thailand
items.title_zh: 泰国火车起重机倒塌后至少32人被炸死
items.summary: At least 32 people have been killed and 66 others injured after a construction crane fell onto a moving train in north-east Thailand.
items.summary_zh: 在泰国东北部,一辆起重机被一辆动车撞倒后,至少32人被炸死,66人受伤。

items.title: 'Grim scene': BBC on site after crane collapses on train in Thailand
items.title_zh: '格里姆场景':BBC在泰国火车起重机倒塌后现场
items.summary: A construction crane fell onto a moving train in north-eastern Thailand, killing at least 32 people and injuring 66 others.
items.summary_zh: 一辆建筑起重机倒入泰国东北部的一列动车,造成至少32人死亡,66人受伤.

items.title: Amateur stuns world's best to win A$1m in Melbourne
items.title_zh: 业余震撼世界第一 在墨尔本赢得一分钱
items.summary: Amateur player Jordan Smith would have been "happy winning just one point" - but walked away with A$1m (£496,835) and bragging rights over world number two Jannik Sinner as he triumphed at the Australian Open's Million Dollar One Point Slam.
items.summary_zh: 业余选手乔丹·史密斯原本会"快乐地只赢得一分"-但带着一分一分(496,835英镑)走开,并吹嘘在世界第二名扬尼克·辛纳(Jannik Sinner)在澳大利亚公开赛上赢得了"百万一分一分"的胜利.

items.title: Russian doctors arrested after 9 babies die in maternity hospital
items.title_zh: 在9名婴儿死后被捕的俄罗斯医生
items.summary: Two senior doctors have been arrested in Russia following the deaths of nine babies in a maternity hospital in Siberia this month.
items.summary_zh: 两名资深医生在本月在西伯利亚一家妇产医院死亡后,在俄罗斯被捕。

items.title: Trump vows 'very strong action' if Iran executes protesters
items.title_zh: 如果伊朗处决抗议者,
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says he'll take "very strong action" if Iran executes protesters.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示,如果伊朗处决抗议者,他将采取"非常有力的行动".

items.title: No power or water and -19C: Kyiv seeks relief from Russian strikes and cold
items.title_zh: 没有电力和水,19C:基辅寻求免于俄罗斯的打击和冷冻
items.summary: At a suburban Kyiv railway station, two carriages painted in the blue and white livery of Ukrainian Railways sit on the main platform, their diesel engines running as snow steadily falls. The train is not going anywhere but it is providing a vital service for dozens of people who have been left without power and basics like running water or heating.
items.summary_zh: 在基辅郊区的一个火车站,两辆涂有乌克兰铁路公司蓝白活字的马车坐落在主站台上,它们的柴油机随着下雪平稳地运行. 火车不会去任何地方,而是为数十人提供重要的服务,他们没有电,也没有自来水或取暖等基本设施。

items.title: K-pop drum duet between Japan and South Korea's leaders caps off summit talks
items.title_zh: 日本和韩国领导人之间的K-pop鼓二重奏 结束了首脑会谈
items.summary: A surreal drum duet between two East Asian world leaders has set the internet abuzz - and put a spotlight on Japan and South Korea's diplomatic relationship.
items.summary_zh: 在东亚世界两位领袖之间,

items.title: Dubai chocolate-inspired dessert takes S Korea by storm
items.title_zh: 迪拜巧克力激起的甜点 以风暴夺去韩国
items.summary: You must have heard of Dubai chocolate : the sticky, indulgent confectionary filled with pistachio cream, tahini and shreds of knafeh pastry, which has become a global sensation.
items.summary_zh: 你们一定听说过迪拜巧克力: 粘稠而放纵的口味,

items.title: 'Welcome to 2976' - North Africa's Amazigh people ring in the new year
items.title_zh: "欢迎来到2976"——北非阿马齐格人新年出道.
items.summary: Across North Africa, the Amazigh people have been coming together to usher in the year 2976.
items.summary_zh: 在整个北非,阿马齐格人民在2976年聚集一堂。

items.title: Canada's Mark Carney faces delicate balancing act in China visit
items.title_zh: 加拿大的Mark Carney在中国的访问中面临微妙的平衡行为
items.summary: Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney is en route to China for a pivotal visit aimed at resetting ties with Beijing and finding new economic opportunities for his country outside the US.
items.summary_zh: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼正在前往中国进行关键访问,目的是与北京重新建立联系,并为他的国家在美国境外寻找新的经济机会。

items.title: What message do Greenlanders have for Trump?
items.title_zh: 格陵兰人对特朗普有什么看法?.
items.summary: The US Vice President JD Vance is hosting the Danish and Greenlandic foreign ministers, as well as their US counterpart, Marco Rubio in the White House on Wednesday.
items.summary_zh: 美国副总统旺斯(JD Vance)星期三在白宫接待丹麦和格陵兰两国的外交部长,以及他们的美国同事马可·鲁比奥.

items.title: 'Now there's the threat of executions' in Iran
items.title_zh: 现在伊朗有处决的威胁
items.summary: Anti-government protests have continued in Iran with thousands feared dead after the government crackdown on demonstrators.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗国内持续有反政府抗议活动,

items.title: Bowen: Authoritarian regimes die gradually then suddenly, but Iran is not there yet
items.title_zh: 博文:独裁政权逐渐消亡,但伊朗尚未到来
items.summary: How does an authoritarian regime die? As Ernest Hemingway famously said about going broke – gradually then suddenly.
items.summary_zh: 专制政权如何消亡? 正如欧内斯特·海明威(Ernest Hemingway)所出名地说的那样,要破产了 — — 然后逐渐地突然。

items.title: Mortuary videos show how deadly Iran crackdown has become
items.title_zh: 迫击炮视频显示伊朗的镇压已变得多么致命。
items.summary: Anti-government protests have swept through major cities and towns across Iran, and the authorities are responding with a harsh crackdown.
items.summary_zh: 反政府抗议席卷了伊朗各地的大城市,当局正以严厉的镇压来回应.

items.title: Watch: Moment skier and dog swept along by avalanche
items.title_zh: 看:滑雪运动员和狗被雪崩卷走
items.summary: Footage recorded by Spanish skier Ares Masip shows the moment she was swept by an avalanche on Pic de l'Hortell, a mountain in Andorra.
items.summary_zh: 西班牙滑雪运动员阿雷斯·马西普(Ares Masip)所记录的足迹显示,她在安道尔的一座山上被雪崩所席卷。
